Package io.goobi.viewer.model.security.authentication

Class SAMLProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.model.security.authentication.SAMLProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuthenticationProvider, Serializable
    public class SAMLProvider
extends Object
implements IAuthenticationProvider, Serializable
    SAMLProvider initiates the SAML authentication flow and is later called by the io.goobi.viewer.servlets.openid.SAMLAssertionServlet to conclude the flow. If a user is not found in the database, the user will be created.
    Author:
    Oliver Paetzel
    See Also:

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: IAuthenticationProvider
        Returns an unique name for the authentication provider implementation
        Specified by:

      • login

        public CompletableFuture<LoginResult> login​(String loginName,
                                            String password)
                                     throws AuthenticationProviderException
        Description copied from interface: IAuthenticationProvider
        Returns a future containing the login result upon completion. The result optionally contains the logged in User as well as the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse to be used to complete the login and possible request forwarding If an error occurs and the request can not be processed, an AuthenticationException must be thrown. If a login has been refused, the exact reasons can be determined using the methods isActive, isSuspended and isRefused
        Specified by:
        login in interface IAuthenticationProvider
        Parameters:
        loginName - a String object.
        password - A string to be used as a password or similar for login. If the provider does not require such a string, this can be left empty or null
        Returns:
        A CompletableFuture which is resolved once login is completed and contains a LoginResult
        Throws:
        AuthenticationProviderException - if any.

      • completeLogin

        public Future<Boolean> completeLogin​(String encodedResponse,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Completes the authentication flow and wakes up the CompletableFuture returned by the login() method.
        Parameters:
        encodedResponse - the base64-encoded SAML-response
        request - The callback request
        response - The callback response
        Returns:
        a future that will be completed when the userBean has redirected the user.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Description copied from interface: IAuthenticationProvider
        The provider type. This should either be "local", "userpassword" or "openId". This value is used to determine where this provider is displayed. Providers with the same type are displayed together
        Specified by:
        getType in interface IAuthenticationProvider
        Returns:
        The type of the provider
